events.title: Publication of 'Silent Spring'
events.description: Rachel Carson's book documented the detrimental effects of pesticides on the environment.

events.title: UN Conference on Human Environment
events.description: First major conference on international environmental issues.

events.title: Brundtland Report
events.description: Introduced the concept of sustainable development.

events.title: Earth Summit in Rio
events.description: UN Conference on Environment and Development that led to Agenda 21.

events.title: Millennium Ecosystem Assessment
events.description: Global assessment of ecosystem changes and their impact on human well-being.

events.title: One Health Initiative
events.description: Collaborative effort to integrate human, animal, and environmental health.

events.title: Lancet Commission on Planetary Health
events.description: Introduced the concept of planetary health.

events.title: Paris Agreement
events.description: International treaty on climate change mitigation and adaptation.

events.title: Planetary Health Alliance Formation
events.description: Consortium of universities, NGOs, and other organizations focused on planetary health.

events.title: UN Biodiversity Conference (COP15)
events.description: Agreement on the Global Biodiversity Framework.

relationships.description: Silent Spring influenced the creation of the UN Conference on Human Environment.
The UN Conference set the stage for the Brundtland Report.
The Brundtland Report influenced the Earth Summit in Rio.
The Lancet Commission led to the formation of the Planetary Health Alliance.
